title: FlightArrivalInformation
description: The arrival information for the flight.

scheduled.description: Scheduled time of arrival including time zone. Format ISO-8601 is used.

estimated.description: Estimated time of arrival including time zone. Format ISO-8601 is used. Every airport should provide the best information he has, corresponding to the FIDS.

actual.description: Actual time of arrival including time zone. Format ISO-8601 is used. Every airport should provide the best information he has, corresponding to the FIDS.

gate.description: The arrival gate for the flight. Depending on the buildings of every airport this could be an gate or area the passenger enters the terminal the first time.
The arrival gates for the flight. Depending on the buildings of every airport this could be an gate or area the passenger enters the terminal the first time.

bookingClass.description: A name (intl) of the booking class - if there are different boarding times for different classes

transferInformation.description: Provide information for your passengers where the nearest transfer desks for this flight can be found.

baggageClaim.description: A list of baggage claims for the flight.
